title: Ajmer Cultural Escape in the Heart of the Holy City
description: From sacred archeological sites and architectural marvels to incredible historic landscapes, uncover the holy spirit of Ajmer with a stay at Grand Xenia Ajmer. Witness the Ajmer Sharif Dargah, where millions of devotees visit dargah to seek blessings from the saint, and explore the 14th-century Taragarh Fort, embellished with intricate stone carvings. Experience an indulgent escape close to the spiritual sites at this award-winning hotel with a complimentary upgrade to a Premium Plus Room, daily breakfast, a three-course dinner and a high tea experience.
offer_address: Hathi Kheda, Foy Sagar Rd, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India
